name: Osborn Barr
description:
Osborn Barr has dug in and advocated for the rural spirit by helping brands engage their audiences – proudly leaving us with the dirtiest hands in the Midwest. At O+B we roll up our sleeves and work towards building a better story on a daily basis. 
 
O+B delivers transformative ideas that help our clients get noticed, create disruption and insert themselves into the conversation. Our talented employees share the same passion for rural America as our clients.
